entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
